title: Photograph, "View of side altar in an unidentified church", 1904–13
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Side altar to St. Joseph (holding the Child). A heavy railing with carved scrolls and a shield, around the base. Wooden screen with tracery along the wall. Upper left, another statue; a man in high clerical dress holding a child.

Same church as 1961-83-13 & -15.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "View of side altar in an unidentified church", 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-14.
